description.tooltip: Analyse des colonnes qui peuvent poser problème
description.label: Colonnes problématiques

queries.query: SELECT t.name, c.name, c.column_id, c.collation_name, ty.name, c.max_length FROM sys.columns c JOIN sys.tables t ON c.object_id = t.object_id JOIN sys.types ty ON c.user_type_id = ty.user_type_id WHERE t.type = 'U' AND t.is_ms_shipped = 0 AND (ty.name IN ('uniqueidentifier', 'text', 'image', 'xml') OR (ty.name LIKE '%varchar' AND c.max_length = -1)) ORDER BY t.name, c.name;
